"The Treasure Shop":
"The Treasure Shop is a special shop which sells rare items. Its stock rotates every day.

You can access the Treasure Shop by opening the Main Menu and selecting Shops. There are two kinds of Treasure Shop:

・N-Meseta
・Star Gems"

"The product lineup is automatically updated once per day, but if you want to see other products right away, you can update it manually.

Manual updates are subject to the following limits:

・One free update per day
・One additional free update per day if you have an active Premium Set
・Three additional updates per day, each of which costs Star Gems"
"The Treasure Shop's products include valuable items that you can't get anywhere else, so be sure to check it every day."
